thread.title: Delightful Hotel with an amazing bed!
thread.title_full: Delightful Hotel with an amazing bed! - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Stephen R
title: Delightful Hotel with an amazing bed!
text:
This is a wonderful hotel situated in the centre of Paris with very attentive and friendly staff. The room was very cosy, beautifully furnished and the best thing by far was the bed, probably the best bed we've ever slept in at a hotel
Room Tip: We were on the 5th floor with a balcony See more room tips
